description: The fortified base of the Arlong Pirates, built along the coastline east of Cocoyasi Village. Features a large pool and multiple buildings designed for fish-man habitation.
significance: Serves as the headquarters of the Arlong Pirates and the primary location for their operations in the Conomi Islands. Symbol of Arlong's oppression over the local villages.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Escapes with Hatchan's Help
keyEvents.description: Zoro departs from Arlong Park with Hatchan unknowingly helping him escape after clearing the base of enemies.

keyEvents.title: Arlong Discovers the Damage
keyEvents.description: Arlong returns to find his base damaged from Zoro's rampage and learns of the intrusion.

keyEvents.title: Shioyaki's Debut
keyEvents.description: Shioyaki appears at Arlong Park during the interrogation of Usopp.

keyEvents.title: Take's Debut
keyEvents.description: Take appears at Arlong Park during the interrogation of Usopp.

keyEvents.title: Nami Appears to Kill Usopp
keyEvents.description: At Arlong Park, Nami stabs her own hand while appearing to kill Usopp to prove her loyalty to the Arlong Pirates.

trivia.fact: Arlong Park was designed to resemble structures from Fish-Man Island, Arlong's homeland.

description: Nami's hometown, a peaceful village in the Conomi Islands that has been under the oppressive rule of the Arlong Pirates for eight years. Known for its tangerine groves.
significance: Nami's birthplace and the village she has been working to save from Arlong's control. Central location in the Arlong Park arc and key to understanding Nami's motivations.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Captured Near Cocoyasi Village
keyEvents.description: Usopp falls from a cliff near Cocoyasi Village and is captured by Chew.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Uses Tamago Boshi
keyEvents.description: While fleeing near Cocoyasi Village, Usopp debuts his Tamago Boshi technique.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Uses Kemuri Boshi
keyEvents.description: Usopp uses his Kemuri Boshi technique near Cocoyasi Village to try to escape.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Ship Crashes at Cocoyasi Village
keyEvents.description: Momoo crashes into the coastline near Cocoyasi Village, bringing Luffy's group to the island.

trivia.fact: Cocoyasi Village is forced to pay 100,000 berries per adult and 50,000 berries per child monthly to the Arlong Pirates to avoid being destroyed.
The village is west of Arlong Park, with Gosa Village further to the west.
